experience.title: Team Lead
experience.description: I have consistently guided cross-functional teams across diverse industries, including financial services, automotive, and technology, while also serving as the architect and developer of the solution.
responsibilities: Lead, mentor and motivate the team to accomplish the project goals.
Define and implement system architecture within Salesforce.
Conduct stakeholder discovery sessions to gather business requirements.
Translate business needs into technical specifications and Salesforce functionality.
Integrate external data sources and third-party tools.
Oversee development of core application logic and reusable component libraries.
Ensure code quality through code reviews and adherence to best practices.
Collaborate with client teams and key stakeholders for solution design.
Drive frontend development using technologies like ReactJS, VueJS, and Angular.

experience.title: Senior Developer
experience.description: Working with globally distributed agile teams, building and maintaining complex systems based on the Salesforce platform.
responsibilities: Guide Jr. developers whenever a new one joined the project
Development of the frontend side of the application mainly with HTML, Javascript and CSS
Development of the backend architecture using Apex Code and declarative capabilities of the Salesforce platform
Migrating Salesforce classic to Lightning experience

experience.title: Semi-Senior Developer
experience.description: Working with an agile team using Scrum methodology to ensure the delivery of high-quality work every weekly iteration.
responsibilities: Develop Salesforce applications using programmatic and declarative capabilities of Salesforce.
Developing complex responsive applications using Apex, Visualforce pages, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: I was developing a web page to manage clients and events for any eye care company.
responsibilities: Developing a web page to manage clients and events for an eye care company.
Implement the interface of the web application in ExtJS.
Help migrate from Salesforce to .NET system.

experience.title: QA Advisory
experience.description: I was in charge of guiding and helping other junior and trainee QAs, in particular with automation. Document all processes regarding the QA activity. Also, having the same responsibilities as the previous role.
responsibilities: Guide and help junior and trainee QAs, particularly with automation
Document all processes regarding QA activity
Perform exploratory testing, write and execute test plans
Maintenance of automated test cases in Jenkins
Test Web Services using SoapUI and CURL
Performance test cases using JMeter

experience.title: QA Tester

responsibilities: Perform exploratory testing
Write and execute test plans
Responsive design testing
Maintenance of automated test cases in Jenkins
Test Web Services using SoapUI and CURL
Performance test cases using JMeter
Responsive design testing
